meanings.definition: The fans of a particular person, team, fictional series, etc.
meanings.sent1: Many fandoms support their favorite artists by attending concerts.
meanings.sent2: Fandoms of the show gather online to discuss the latest episodes.
meanings.sent3: The fandoms at the sports event cheered loudly for their team.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, fandoms are like dedicated tribes following their idols.
meanings.sent5: The colorful banners and enthusiastic cheers showed the unity of the fandoms.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being a fan.
meanings.sent1: Her fandoms for science fiction movies led her to collect memorabilia.
meanings.sent2: The intense fandoms for the soccer team made the stadium atmosphere electric.
meanings.sent3: His extreme fandoms for superheroes sometimes made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The deep fandoms she had for classic literature shaped her book collection.
meanings.sent5: The pure joy in their eyes reflected their shared fandoms for the band.
